about.title: About Me
about.bio1: Hi! I'm Yaroslav, a Frontend Developer with 2+ years of experience based in Wrocław, Poland. I specialize in React, Next.js, and TypeScript — modernizing legacy systems, optimizing web performance (LCP/CLS), and delivering pixel-perfect interfaces.
about.bio2: I have a proven track record of mentoring junior developers and building full-stack MVPs. I'm passionate about clean code, great UX, and tackling complex technical challenges.
contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to say hi? I'd love to hear from you.
